mapper.sql: territory.id_territory AS TERR_id_territory, territory.code AS TERR_code, territory.fk_type AS TERR_fk_type, territory.start_date AS TERR_start_date, territory.end_date AS TERR_end_date
mapper.select: SELECT , ( SELECT tni.value FROM territory_name LEFT OUTER JOIN territory_name_identifier tni ON tni.fk_territory_name = territory_name.id_territory_name LEFT OUTER JOIN identifier i1 ON i1.id_identifier = tni.fk_identifier WHERE territory_name.fk_territory = territory.id_territory AND territory_name.end_date = ( SELECT MAX(tn1.end_date) AS max_end_date FROM territory_name tn1 WHERE tn1.fk_territory = territory.id_territory ) AND i1.code = '${@org.wipo.connect.shared.exchange.enumerator.IdentifierTypeEnum@TISA.name()}' ) AS TN_tisa FROM territory WHERE territory.id_territory = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO territory( code, fk_type, start_date, end_date ) VALUES ( #{code}, #{fkType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate} )
select next from _sequences where name = 'ID_TERRITORY_SEQ'
mapper.select:
SELECT , t1.default_value AS TN_name, tni.value AS TN_tisa FROM territory LEFT JOIN territory_name ON territory_name.fk_territory = territory.id_territory
LEFT OUTER JOIN territory_name_identifier tni ON (tni.fk_territory_name = territory_name.id_territory_name) LEFT OUTER JOIN translation t1 on (t1.id_translation = territory_name.fk_name) WHERE territory_name.end_date = ( SELECT MAX(tn1.end_date) AS max_end_date FROM territory_name tn1 WHERE tn1.fk_territory = territory.id_territory ) ORDER BY TERR_code

SELECT
FROM territory INNER JOIN territory_name ON territory_name.fk_territory = territory.id_territory LEFT OUTER join translation t1 on (t1.id_translation = territory_name.fk_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t2 on (t2.id_translation = territory_name.fk_official_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t3 on (t3.id_translation = territory_name.fk_abbreviated_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t4 on (t4.id_translation = territory_name.fk_unofficial_name)
WHERE territory.id_territory = #{idTerritory}
ORDER BY CODE_TISA
mapper.sql: territory.id_territory AS TERR_id_territory , territory.code AS TERR_code, territory.fk_type AS TERR_fk_type , territory.start_date AS TERR_start_date , territory.end_date AS TERR_end_date , territory.user_insert AS TERR_user_insert , territory.date_insert AS TERR_date_insert , territory.user_update AS TERR_user_update , territory.date_update AS TERR_date_update , territory.managed_by_cmo AS TERR_managed_by_cmo, territory_name.fk_name AS TERA_fk_name, territory_name.fk_official_name AS TERA_fk_official_name, territory_name.fk_abbreviated_name AS TERA_fk_abbreviated_name, territory_name.fk_unofficial_name AS TERA_fk_unofficial_name, t1.default_value as TRASL_name, t2.default_value as TRASL_official_name, t3.default_value as TRASL_abbreviated_name, t4.default_value as TRASL_unofficial_name, (SELECT tni.value FROM territory_name_identifier tni INNER JOIN identifier i1 ON i1.id_identifier = tni.fk_identifier WHERE tni.fk_territory_name = territory_name.id_territory_name AND i1.code = 'TISA') as CODE_TISA

territory.id_territory AS TERR_id_territory , territory.code AS TERR_code, territory.fk_type AS TERR_fk_type , territory_name.start_date AS TERR_start_date , territory_name.end_date AS TERR_end_date , territory_name.fk_name AS TERA_fk_name, territory_name.fk_official_name AS TERA_fk_official_name, territory_name.fk_abbreviated_name AS TERA_fk_abbreviated_name, territory_name.fk_unofficial_name AS TERA_fk_unofficial_name, t1.default_value as TRASL_name, t2.default_value as TRASL_official_name, t3.default_value as TRASL_abbreviated_name, t4.default_value as TRASL_unofficial_name, (SELECT tni.value FROM territory_name_identifier tni INNER JOIN identifier i1 ON i1.id_identifier = tni.fk_identifier WHERE tni.fk_territory_name = territory_name.id_territory_name AND i1.code = 'TISA') as CODE_TISA

SELECT , type_ref.code AS TYPE_CODE FROM territory INNER JOIN territory_name ON territory_name.fk_territory = territory.id_territory LEFT OUTER join translation t1 on (t1.id_translation = territory_name.fk_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t2 on (t2.id_translation = territory_name.fk_official_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t3 on (t3.id_translation = territory_name.fk_abbreviated_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t4 on (t4.id_translation = territory_name.fk_unofficial_name) LEFT OUTER JOIN reference type_ref on type_ref.id_reference = territory.fk_type
mapper.select:
WHERE ((territory_name.start_date IS NULL OR territory_name.start_date <= now()) AND (territory_name.end_date IS NULL OR territory_name.end_date >= now())) AND managed_by_cmo = 1
ORDER BY TRASL_name

SELECT , territory_name_identifier.value AS TERR_id_value FROM territory INNER JOIN territory_name ON territory_name.fk_territory = territory.id_territory INNER JOIN territory_name_identifier on territory_name_identifier.fk_territory_name=territory_name.id_territory_name LEFT OUTER join translation t1 on (t1.id_translation = territory_name.fk_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t2 on (t2.id_translation = territory_name.fk_official_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t3 on (t3.id_translation = territory_name.fk_abbreviated_name) LEFT OUTER join translation t4 on (t4.id_translation = territory_name.fk_unofficial_name) WHERE ((territory_name.start_date IS NULL OR territory_name.start_date <= now()) AND (territory_name.end_date IS NULL OR territory_name.end_date >= now())) ORDER BY TRASL_name

INNER JOIN reference ON territory.fk_type=reference.id_reference
WHERE reference.code = '${@org.wipo.connect.common.utils.ConstantUtils@REFERENCE_CODE_COUNTRY}'
ORDER BY TRASL_name

INNER JOIN reference ON territory.fk_type=reference.id_reference
WHERE (reference.code = '${@org.wipo.connect.common.utils.ConstantUtils@REFERENCE_CODE_COUNTRY}' OR territory.code = '${@org.wipo.connect.common.utils.ConstantUtils@WORLD_TERRITORY_CODE}') and ((territory_name.start_date IS NULL OR territory_name.start_date <= now()) AND (territory_name.end_date IS NULL OR territory_name.end_date >= now()))
ORDER BY TRASL_name

INNER JOIN territory_name_identifier on territory_name_identifier.FK_TERRITORY_NAME = territory_name.id_TERRITORY_NAME INNER JOIN identifier aux_i on aux_i.ID_IDENTIFIER = territory_name_identifier.FK_IDENTIFIER WHERE aux_i.CODE='TISA' AND territory_name_identifier.VALUE=#{code} AND territory.start_DATE <= now() AND territory.end_DATE >= now()

WHERE territory.id_territory in (SELECT aux_th.fk_child_territory FROM territory_hierarchy aux_th INNER JOIN territory aux_t ON aux_t.id_territory = aux_th.fk_territory INNER JOIN territory_name aux_tn on aux_tn.FK_TERRITORY = aux_t.id_territory INNER JOIN territory_name_identifier aux_tni on aux_tni.FK_TERRITORY_NAME = aux_tn.id_TERRITORY_NAME INNER JOIN identifier aux_i on aux_i.ID_IDENTIFIER = aux_tni.FK_IDENTIFIER WHERE aux_i.CODE='TISA' AND aux_tni.VALUE=#{parentCode} AND territory.start_DATE <= now() AND territory.end_DATE >= now() )
